mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (m_id, m_name, m_handle, m_email, m_pwd, m_bdate, regdate, m_gender, m_img_name, m_img_path, m_bio, m_role) VALUES (member_seq.nextval, #{m_name}, #{m_handle}, #{m_email}, #{m_pwd}, to_date(#{m_bdate},'YYYY-MM-DD'), sysdate, #{m_gender}, #{m_img_name}, #{m_img_path}, #{m_bio}, #{m_role})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE m_email = #{email}
select m_id, m_name, m_handle, m_img_name, m_img_path from member where m_id=#{mid}
SELECT m_name FROM member WHERE m_id = #{m_id}
SELECT m_id, m_name, m_email, m_bio, m_img_name, m_handle FROM member WHERE m_name LIKE '%' || #{m_name} || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE m_handle = #{handle}
mapper.update: update member set m_img_name=#{m_img_name}, m_img_path=#{m_img_path} where m_id=#{m_id}
update member set m_name=#{m_name} where m_id=#{m_id}
update member set m_handle=#{m_handle} where m_id=#{m_id}
update member set m_bio=#{m_bio} where m_id=#{m_id}
update member set m_gender=#{m_gender} where m_id=#{m_id}
update member set m_password=#{new_pwd} where m_id=#{m_id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from member where m_id=#{m_id} and m_password=#{m_password}
